title: [Skin Concepts] Bear Rider Sej and Voli-Boar
body:
Got this idea from another thread, but it seemed too good an idea to let be just a comment.

The idea would be to switch up Volibear and Sejuani's boar.  Sej's skin get's a bear that looks suspiciously like Volibear, and Volibear's skin makes him look like a Boar with human qualities similar to his normal skin.

I know there's already a bear riding Sej skin, but it's not specifically Volibear... which looking at their background would be VERY insulting to Volibear, I think...
